user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and stylish legwear that could be versatile for different occasions.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to the product because of its cute design and comfort features. The smooth brushed fabric and high-waisted style appealed to my need for both style and comfort in my wardrobe. The positive reviews and the promise of versatility for various occasions also influenced my decision.

I needed a versatile piece that could be dressed up or down, and the description highlighted comfort and a flattering fit. My experience with sizing led me to make a careful choice after returning the first pair, which indicates I was focused on finding the right fit and comfort level.

I was looking for high-quality legwear, but my experience was disappointing due to sizing issues. The product did not meet my expectations, which led me to prefer another brand that I found more reliable.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer exceptional comfort and fit, particularly in footwear and undergarments. I value features such as cushioned support, adjustable straps, and breathable materials that prevent discomfort during extended wear. I appreciate responsive customer service and good value for money, as seen in my positive experiences with sandals that provide both style and comfort. Conversely, I tend to dislike items that do not fit well, especially bras that have sizing inconsistencies or uncomfortable bands. I also find poor quality materials or designs that do not accommodate my body shape to be unappealing. Overall, I seek products that combine comfort, quality, and a good fit, while avoiding those that compromise on these aspects.
